t: Amazon.com: CreoPop 3D Printing Pen : Arts, Crafts & Sewing
s: If you can write with a pen, you can draw in 3D! CreoPop is the first, wireless 3D-printing pen with cool inks. Create 3D art pieces by hand utilizing integrated LEDs that solidify the ink as you draw, while keeping the pen and 3D art piece cool to the touch.
Operating instructions and pdf manual for use - CreoPop User manual

CreoPop (www.creopop.com) is the world’s first 3D pen with cool ink. In contrast to other 3D pens, there are no hot parts, no melting plastic and no unpleasant smell. Instead, CreoPop uses photopolymers that are solidified using LED diodes to let users create amazing 3D designs.

s: This is a 3-pack of photopolymer ink that is solidified using built in LEDs to let you focus on creating designs rather than being worried about Burning your fingers. Changing ink takes just a few seconds. Use with your creopop 3D printing pen.
